title: WTB/WTT for T206 Boston National Players

posts.post_title: WTB/WTT for T206 Boston National Players
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim
I would like to buy or trade for Boston National T206 players.

Preference is SGC 40 or better, would like some of the uncommon backs if possible but I know could be wishful thinking.

I will buy outright or could be open to trading for PSA graded HOF'ers.

If you have anything you think I may be interested in email me scans at abravefan@msn.com

I'm also still looking for PSA graded T205 Boston Rustlers.
